mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE 1=1 AND start_date <= date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') AND end_date >= date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') LIMIT ${amount * (pageNum-1)}, ${amount}
SELECT count(*) FROM notice WHERE 1=1 AND start_date <= date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') AND end_date >= date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d')
SELECT * FROM notice WHERE 1=1 AND start_date <= date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') AND end_date >= date_format(sysdate(), '%Y%m%d') AND seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (subject, contents, date, start_date, end_date, views, writer ) VALUES ( #{subject}, #{contents}, #{date}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, 0, #{writer} )
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET subject = #{subject}, contents = #{contents}, start_date = #{start_date}, end_date = #{end_date}, writer = #{writer} WHERE seq = #{seq}
